name: Pizza
desc: Pizza is a popular Italian dish made with a crispy base, rich tomato sauce, melted cheese, and delicious toppings. It is loved for its cheesy flavor and variety of styles.

name: Burger
desc: Burger is a classic fast food made with a soft bun, juicy patty, fresh vegetables, and tasty sauces. It is filling, flavorful, and perfect for quick meals.

name: Biryani
desc: Biryani is a traditional rice dish cooked with aromatic spices, herbs, and meat or vegetables. It is famous for its rich taste and mouth-watering aroma.

name: Chinese
desc: Chinese food includes noodles, fried rice, and stir-fried dishes prepared with sauces and vegetables. It is known for its bold flavors and quick cooking style.

name: Desserts
desc: Desserts are sweet dishes enjoyed after meals, such as cakes, ice creams, and pastries. They add happiness and a sweet ending to any meal.

name: Drinks
desc: Drinks include refreshing beverages like juices, soft drinks, and shakes. They help to relax, refresh the body, and complete the food experience.

name: Dosa
desc: Dosa is a popular South Indian dish made from fermented rice and lentil batter. It is thin, crispy, and usually served with chutney and sambar.
